title: New: Disclosure – Boiling (Feat. Sinead Harnett)
content:
We’ve known for a while now just how talented the Disclosure kids are, with them undoubtedly being at the forefront of the hugely exciting movement of young, innovative producers.

New track Boiling featuring the sumptuous vocals of Sinead Harnett may well be their finest work to date, conjuring up a magical and thoroughly enthralling atmosphere amongst the deep synths and dubstep inspired beat. Boiling is the first track to be taken from their highly anticipated forthcoming EP The Face released 4 June on Greco-Roman.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
